short_summary: Multifunction Printers for Minister of National Defence
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Multifunction Printers for the Department of National Defence
#### Solicitation Number: BPM020562/25183

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**


## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025183:T
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Publication Date:** January 16, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 14, 2024 (14:00:00 local time)
* **Amendment Date:** February 12, 2024

## Contract Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of 57 portable multifunction printers. The equipment provided must meet the requirements of the department's existing printer fleet.

## Tender Categories

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Person:** Jesse Squirrell
* **Phone:** 613-791-6257
* **Email:** [None]
* **Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K2P 2H8

## Attached Files

A package of documents is available for download. You can access them by visiting the following URLs:

* English: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/7F23CA96-EC49-4777-BD19-C619B01BFF62](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/7F23CA96-EC49-4777-BD19-C619B01BFF62)
* French: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/9E512430-D689-405B-B07F-15F25D2F662F](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/9E512430-D689-405B-B07F-15F25D2F662F)

Note: The documents are also available on the [Shared Services Canada](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/) website. Please ensure you consult the reverse auction briefing document and follow the instructions outlined in the document
